item.description:
Yeh you can get High by smoking POT, sniffing glue, or smelling old socks...BUT wouldnt you want to get some excersize and see a nice sunset from a prime location..??

quit whining and bring some wine...


Yeh its last minute...its a weather dependant kind of meetup...need to see the sunset for a sunset event...

(FunnyBone maybe Wednesday) so think ahead..

This Location is pretty good because of its pleasant atmosphere of talking, excersizing, and enjoying a mixture of snacks and beverages while sitting atop the mountains and watching the sun as it is setting..

(im Looking for a safe place for fire pit for a short after party....where the cops wont find us...so if you are a wanted criminal...this part is not for you)

You can bring what you want, i like bringing a chez or chips and a bottle of white zinfindel or whatever else looks good for the evening. Its not a big meal but something thats easy to make or cary.
Those who dont drink can bring sparkling something..


From all the past simmilar events, this location has some special plusses...we can walk to the top or some can drive to the top..but don't you want to work a bit for a reward ??

Ok enough of the subliminal messages to get you to a nice location..

It is a relatively short walk of light hiking to the top of the tower...

and we all know when i say a short walk..its short enough...

If you are new to this event or location, Im not going to tell you what your visual reward is going to be a top the tower..ya just have to go to see it....so there.

Yeh you have to work a bit for your reward....its worth it..
we take our time...no hurry...
besides its all down hill on the way out....


bring a flashlight..some kind of bug spray too

Getting There:
(1) From Enfield: take 190 east...
Pass the intersection of rte 83 one mile later look for the right onto Gulf road..
Take Gulf road south for about 1.5 miles, look for the parking area of Soapstone mth on your right..
if you see Handle road you just missed it..

(2) From Hartford: Take 84 east
at exit 67 = rte 31
take a left (north) on 31 go about a mile up
Take a right on rte 30 (East)
follow that till you meetup with rte 74..
stay on rte 30 by going left at the 30 sign where 74 splits off again..
Follow 30 up about 3.5 miles, this is a bit tricky, there is a left turn here called Burbank st..
if you miss it and get to the intersection of 30 and 140, just take a left (east ) onto 140 and take the first right onto Burbank Road... stay on Burbank road (changes into gulf road a little ways up) for about 2.5 miles...after Handle Road its the left entrance way parking lot to soapstone...

We will meet in the lot right at the entrance way..
I drive a blue older Toyota Avalon..
And will put the customary orange cones somewhere for you to see em..

for other directions (Mapquest/GPS/other) type in; 365 Gulf road, Somers, CT..that will get you close enough...

its starting to dark earlie..so we wont waite too long..if you are late..the road is easy to follow..we make so much noise and we might have a raging fire on the top of the tower ya should find us...
If it looks like limited time..we might drive up...
I will have the grill in the trunk...have some left over hot dog and buger bunns..thedevil didnt eat them....
